tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I Have been coming to Dr. Karan Marya since last 32 yrs. Being a True Capricorn, Dental issue are walking hand in hand with me. Met with a small accident 32 yrs back and fractured my front teeth. Dr. Karan not only help restoring my broken teeth but reconstructed them in such a way that they look so very natural, giving me my lost smile back. 
Two yrs back I got Dental implants too from him. It's was a very smooth n painless procedure. He is so gentle n stays so calm with his patients esp Me who reaches out to him when things go totally out of hands.... **** ** *** ***** *** ** **** ***** ***** ****** ****. 
  I am very grateful for all he has done to make my life comfortable and pain-free.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Marya is very caring and helpful doctor. Mine was the case of broken front tooth and crooked teeth where other doctors suggested for tooth removal but I took second opinion from Doctor Geetanjali who not only saved my front tooth but also has given a fresh look to my face by smile design with zirconia crowns and Dr Karan gave life to my tooth through root canal treatment

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Marya has a very good team of experts and assistants. The Clinic is very well managed and is exceptionally clean and hygienic which is commendable. It has modern equipment and devices. Marya's Dental is a great place to go for your dental care and health.Dr Karan did a great job by placing 2 painless implants. Dr Geetanjali gave me a white smile by bleaching!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was my first time to see a dentist and Doctor Karan diagnosed my problem well and treated it perfectly. I can’t thank enough for the special, excellent care Dr. have provided and for the unique gift he is to patients. I am blessed that he  is my Doc !

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My dad went through a Dental process at Dr Maryas clinic. My dad paid 98,000 for some semi dentures. Dr Marya removed a bridge which was existing *** ******* * ***** ******** ********** ******* ******* ******* *** * *****.

** ***** ********* *** ********* We took him to 4 other reputed dental clinics. Wherein all 4 other dentist have given in writing that Dr marya should not have removed the exiting bridge. And that his treatment plan has not been good. And that he also over charged.

A disappointed daughter of a 77 year old father. *** * **** ******* ****** **** ***** *** ******* ** ****** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been going to Dr.Marya for years now, superb Doctor and equally good person, dental treatments generally are very painful as teeths are so sensitive but he ensures that you experience negligible amount of pain.
I will definitely recommend Dr.Karan Marya.

tags: None
review:
Very systematic,caring, bothers to explain the patient full treatment .He is available even latter on phone to clarify doubts .
so far no problem with the treatment hopefully , I am cured .
I feel very comfortable discussing problem. He gives a patient hearing.******** **** ****  ******** ** **** ******

tags: None
review: Dr Marya was extremely gentle with my wisdom molar extraction, before I knew it was over    I have come back to the clinic after 15years as I stay overseas now and must say the pleasant experience continues . This clinlc is always  clean and perfect and having good facilities for diagnosis etc. Kudos keep the good work going!!!!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Listens to your problem & makes u feel comfortable before starting the treatment.  He does work with Very clinically accuracy & with patience. Has taken remarkable precautions during covid which makes the patient feel safe to go to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: All was good, keep it up. Safety guidelines and precautions were followed. I felt comfortable. The doctor was also patient and friendly.

review: Dr. Marya is quick in judgment, decisive, confident *** ***** ******** in diagnosis. They are quite punctual. The stuff is polite and helpful.

tags: None
review: Had gone for my yearly general dental check up. Horrible experience, he was absolutely impersonal. The entire setup is extremely commercial. Wouldn't recommend him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have been visiting the doctor for last 17-18 years and always found satisfactory services. We have also been recommending Dr.Marya in our circle and all are satisfied n happy. Please maintain this service in future too.

The doctor gave us an appointment even though he was fully booked as we had an emergency requirement. 
Prompt to see us and quick remedy to the problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: A thoroughly professional and well operated clinic . Dr Karan is a gentle and extremely competent dentist

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
With Dr. Marya you dont feel like a patient, he treats you like one would treat their own relatives, such hospitality. The best part is just how patient he is listening to everything we have to say.

A lovely experience everytime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This was my third appointment and each time I was seen on time! No waiting period, unlike most other doctors, who give the same time for a visit to 5-6 patients!! Also, I had a crown fitted on my tooth , which was completed very professionally and hygeinically.

tags: None
review: it has been a great experience so far. I have been visiting the doctor for years now and would recommend him to many others. surely the dentist of choice!

review: I got my RCT done. After hearing all the scary stories from my friends about their experience with other dentists. I must say that I had an amazing painless procedure done .  Highly recommend this clinic!!!!
